item.title: Herring Charles II Oxfords
item.description: Introduction The Black Cap-Toe Oxford is the most elegant and traditional shoe a man can own. This model is styled by English shoe distributor Herring and made by Alfred Sargent. Available in a Black Calf and an Oak Calf, this shoe is incredibly versatile and can be worn in nearly all situations. It is crafted using traditional English shoe-making techniques, if taken care of properly, this shoe will last for years to come.
